pullRequest.title: iOS - Standalone UI fixes.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added subtitle for Leave Study in resources.
Fix Back button in About Study.

commit.message:
- Add subtext for resources.
- Show subtitle for Leave in standalone App.
Show back button in standalone App for about study.

nodes.bodyText:
why are these strings stored within code and not with other app content in branding.plist?
also there is a LocalizableString.txt that was not updated here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -15,6 +15,10 @@ enum LocalizableString: String {
 
   // MARK: Resources
   case resourceNotAvailable = "This resource is currently unavailable."
+  case leaveStudy = "Leave Study"
+  case aboutStudy = "About the Study"
+  case consentPDF = "Consent PDF"
+  case leaveSubtitle = "This will also delete your app account."

commit.message:
Merge branch 'early-access' of https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies into ios-standalone-patch

* 'early-access' of https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/fda-mystudies: (28 commits)
  Update ActivitiesViewController.swift
  free up com.google.FDAMystudies bundle ID (#528)
  Refresh notifications from view load.
  User /healthCheck in all services (#512)
  - Fetch dashboard responses concurrently. - Show activities and dashboard setup messages.
  Add message in progress view.
  Include firestore iam config in rename script (#523)
  Add attribute-based validation to user-mgmt service
  Rename iOS app to FDA MyStudies (#509)
  [iOS] verifyEmailId call includes userId (#493)
  added @InitBinder to a @ControllerAdvice so that it is automatically applied to all Controllers
  Fix registering notifications for standalone App.
  User-mgmt: combine confirmation emails, improve logs (#511)
  Improve error logging (#513)
  Fix healthCheck for WCP (#477)
  added PropertyEditorSupport to tackle XSS attacked and removed custome logic
  Created audit-log-modules and common-modules
  Replaced and moved the delete account msg to the list instead pop-up
  Refactor methods and properties name.
  Fixed PR review comments
  ...
